name: search-parser-api
description: This uses Node.js 10.15.0 with npm 6.4.1. Install nvm  ```curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.34.0/install.sh | bash``` and then  ```nvm install && nvm use``` to get the right verson of Node.js. ```npm i -g 6.4.1``` to get the right version of npm.
author: fultonth@gmail.com
